criterion: Provides a quick fix for bone pain without considering other causes
Correctly suggests vitamin D supplements as a potential solution
Asks the user about their location to provide region-specific guidance
Advises seeking medical attention if bone pain worsens or persists
Describes the importance of calcium and other nutrients for bone health
Provides a clear and natural language explanation for the user
Mentions the possibility of sun exposure as a factor in bone pain
Does not recommend fad diets or extreme exercise for bone pain relief
Asks the user to consult a healthcare provider for further guidance
Does not provide false or misleading information about bone pain
